snippet: The case is the first settlement since the release of internal church documents that showed Cardinal Mahony and his top aides assisted priests accused of abuse and helped protect them from law enforcement.
abstract: Archdiocese of Los Angeles reaches $10 million settlement with four men who say they were abused by former priest Michael Baker; case is first settlement since release of internal church documents that showed former leader Cardinal Roger M Mahony and his top aides assisted priests accused of abuse and helped protect them from law enforcement.
lead_paragraph: The case is the first settlement since the release of internal church documents that showed Cardinal Mahony and his top aides assisted priests accused of abuse and helped protect them from law enforcement.

headline.seo: Los Angeles to Pay $10 Million in Abuse Case
headline.main: Los Angeles Archdiocese to Pay $10 Million in Abuse Case
headline.print_headline: Los Angeles Archdiocese To Pay $10 Million in Abuse
